INSERT INTO TB_Daily_Stat_User(
) SELECT A.user_id,A.Stat_Dt,Sale_Count,Sale_Amount,Rent_Count,Rent_Amount,'admin',now() FROM ( SELECT tb.user_id, DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d') Stat_Dt,IFNULL(Order_Count,0) Sale_Count, IFNULL(Order_Amount,0) Sale_Amount,'admin', NOW() FROM tb_user tb left join ( SELECT TWR.User_ID, Count(Work_Seq) Order_Count, Sum(Product_Price) Order_Amount FROM TB_Work_Bottle TWB, tb_work_report TWR WHERE Bottle_Work_Cd in ('0308') AND TWB.Work_Report_Seq = TWR.Work_Report_Seq AND DATE_FORMAT(TWB.Create_dt,'%Y/%m/%d')= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d') Group by User_ID ) tc on tb.User_ID = tc.User_ID WHERE User_Part_CD='01' and tb.Delete_YN= 'N' )A, ( SELECT tb.User_ID, DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d') Stat_Dt,IFNULL(Order_Count,0) Rent_Count, IFNULL(Order_Amount,0) Rent_Amount,'admin', NOW() FROM tb_user tb left join ( SELECT TWR.User_ID, Count(Work_Seq) Order_Count, Sum(Product_Price) Order_Amount FROM TB_Work_Bottle TWB, tb_work_report TWR WHERE Bottle_Work_Cd in ('0309') AND TWB.Work_Report_Seq = TWR.Work_Report_Seq AND DATE_FORMAT(TWB.Create_dt,'%Y/%m/%d')= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d') Group by User_ID ) tc on tb.User_ID = tc.User_ID WHERE User_Part_CD='01' and tb.Delete_YN= 'N' ) B WHERE A.User_ID= B.User_ID

INSERT INTO TB_Monthly_Stat_User(
) SELECT User_ID , LEFT(Stat_Dt,7) , SUM(Sale_Count) , SUM(Sale_Amount) , SUM(Rent_Count) , SUM(Rent_Amount) , 'admin' , NOW() FROM TB_Daily_Stat_User WHERE LEFT(Stat_Dt,7)= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m') GROUP BY User_ID,LEFT(Stat_Dt,7)
